recipesJson.name: Candy Bar | DEVELOPED
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
Continuing with our chocolate theme the last few weeks, we wanted to utilize the awesomeness of WF Nanaimo Bar.  If you don't have this flavor and you want to create a chocolate candy bar, pick it up, it's a great flavor to build around.    We wanted to create a caramel filled, crunchy, chocolate covered bar, and after a week or 2 steep, we think this comes pretty damn close.  Full recipe notes at 
https://youtu.be/rrDOUgfwQq8  .  

This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: NaChef, Max Savage, and Folkart.
Our weekly episodes are released at 6:00pm EST every other Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST.

Check out our website at https://www.DevelopedDIY.com - We now have Merch!
Find us on YouTube https://www.youtube.com/c/DevelopedDIY
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/developeddiy/
Check out our FaceBook Page at https://www.facebook.com/developeddiy/

![Legacy](https://imgur.com/LA0lhIG.png)

reviews.text: This is very candy bar like, and also just a solid tasty recipe. I get a little bit of coconut from the nanaimo bar, but it seems like that's what's helping it taste more like a chocolate bar. I love what the butter pecan is doing here too.
